abstract: Jason Paul Smith of Harts, W Va, is arrested in Lubbock, Tex, on charges that he made hoax phone call claiming to be terrorist and threatening to blow up Statue of Liberty.
lead_paragraph: Jason Paul Smith said in a call to 911 that he was Abdul Yasin, the only conspirator not captured in the 1993 attack on the World Trade Center, according to a court complaint.

headline.main: Man Charged in Statue of Liberty Bombing Hoax
headline.print_headline: Man Charged in Statue of Liberty Bombing Hoax

snippet: Jason Paul Smith said in a call to 911 that he was Abdul Yasin, the only conspirator not captured in the 1993 attack on the World Trade Center, according to a court complaint.
